name: The Secret of George Brown
description:
The Secret of George Brown

YouTube Devlog link

How to Play

  • WASD Move in the Scene.
  • You will be presented with the options to choose from when an encounter with the enemy occurs. If you are successful to kill the enemy you will be awarded experience points that will be used to Up your level in Game.
